source_objects.title: Human Resources
source_objects.description: Learn human resources with courses ranging from oracle human capital management to attracting, hiring and retaining the best people.

items.title: Diversity Through a More Comprehensive Perspective for HR

visible_instructors.name: Illumeo
visible_instructors.title: Illumeo Learning
visible_instructors.job_title: Condensed and Efficient Courses for Busy Professionals

items.headline: This course examines diversity through a more comprehensive perspective.
objectives_summary: Explore the increasing demands for diversity in the "Sharing Economy".
Discover a wider scope for diversity in the workplace.
Identify the critical components of a strategic plan utilizing diversity to deliver world class innovation.

items.title: Generational Theory: How differences Impact the Workplace

visible_instructors.name: Illumeo
visible_instructors.title: Illumeo Learning
visible_instructors.job_title: Condensed and Efficient Courses for Busy Professionals

items.headline: This course takes a fresh look at generational theory and how differences impact and apply to today’s workplace.
objectives_summary: Identify the distinction between mentorship and coaching.
Discover the basics of generational theories.
Explore how generational differences impact and apply to today’s workplace.

items.title: Recruitment Automation and Scraping

visible_instructors.title: Josef Kadlec
visible_instructors.name: Josef
visible_instructors.job_title: Founder at GoodCall & Recruitment Academy ■ Author of Recruitment Engineering ■ Hireconomics ■ People as Merchandise

items.headline: Practical guide to automation of the routine tasks in recruitment process
objectives_summary: What can be automated in recruitment process
Native automation which is already part of LinkedIn
Description of external tools for automation of individual parts of recruitment process

items.title: Mindfully Manage Yourself At Work 2
items.headline: Course 2: Conflicts & Mental Framework
objectives_summary: Gain insights about mindfully deaing with people who have different views and ideas
Investigate the nature of your conflicts by applying the "mental framework" methodology
Examine your behavioral patterns when dealing with conflicts

items.title: Compensation and Benefits Responsibilities (HRCI-PHR/SPHR)
items.headline: Course 15 of 20 of The Human Resources Certification Program (HRCI - PHR/SPHR)
objectives_summary: Noncash Compensation Methods
Common Benefits Programs
Fiduciary Responsibilities

items.title: A Security Professional's Guide to the Lie Detector
items.headline: Understanding lies, law and liability
objectives_summary: Students will determine the difference between lie detector myths and realities.
You will learn the history of the polygraph and why the U.S. government restricts its use.
Understand the accuracy of current polygraph technology.

items.headline: PHR, SPHR
objectives_summary: Introduction to Human Resource Management

items.headline: Job Analysis: Identify the actual requirement of people and right fit for the right job
objectives_summary: Job Analysis
Purpose of Job Analysis
Applications of Job Analysis

Salary negotiation

objectives_summary: Elements of an Organizational Strategy

items.title: CARE leadership: how to lead in hybrid workplaces

visible_instructors.name: Luciana
visible_instructors.title: Luciana Paulise
visible_instructors.job_title: Culture and Productivity Coach, Book author and Speaker

items.headline: 12 leadership skills to improve team engagement, productivity and innovation in co-located, remote and hybrid workplaces
objectives_summary: Find solutions to the new challenges of leading a remote team
Identify the four CARE values
Practice 12 skills to strengthen your hybrid team cohesion and productivity

items.title: Are You Suited to Job Sharing?
items.headline: Job sharing is not for everyone.  Here, you'll learn if you have the ability to job share by looking at yourself.
objectives_summary: Thinking of job sharing?  Do you know how suited you are to that type of work?  What will it take?  What will it cost you?
Office Operations

items.title: Performance Review Guidelines for Employees
items.headline: How to ensure that YOU get recognised for your work
objectives_summary: You will know how to prepare for your performance review
You will know how to set SMART objectives
You will learn how to manage upwards

items.title: Manager's Role In Developing Talent
items.headline: A practical approach to developing those around you.
objectives_summary: Define the purpose and ultimate goal of talent development.
Articulate a practical and effective talent development process.
Explain the manager's and the employee's role (along with other key stakeholders) in the development process.
